title: Kawlkil thlenga buh awmte chu
lyrics:
Kawlkil thlenga buh awmte chu,
Lak khawm an lo hun ta e;
Ram ni eng leh phaia mi pawh
An lo hmin zo ta a ni.

Aw Lalpa, kan dil chhung che hian,
Nangin min lo ngaithla la;
Tunah attu rawn tir chhuak la,
An lo boral zawh hma hian.

Zing leh zanah eng lai pawhin,
Ni tlak dawn tawhah te pawh,
Aw Lalpa, buh seng khawm turin,
Anmahni tir chhuak ta che.

Aw, hmanhmawh la, an til mek e,
Rangkachak buhphalte chu,
Lalpa zemah i rawn thlen chuan,
Lawm
takin i awmpui ang.
